PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-10272021-12-17,  ,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, III and VI — RESA)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, III AND VI – RESA) in order to require Canadian-certified aerodromes to extend their current safety area from the existing mandated 60 meters (beyond the runway ends) to a minimum length of 150 meters at the ends of runways that serve scheduled commercial passenger-carrying flights. Canadian airports with an annual passenger threshold of at least 325,000 for two consecutive years will be subject to the amendments. In the event that it is not possible to increase the size of the existing safety area outside the runway, the amendments offer other options that provide an equivalent level of safety. The amendments are being imposed on existing runways that are not currently subject to the 150 meters requirement in the fifth edition of the Aerodrome Standards and Recommended Practices (TP 312).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0269 Publication Date: 2022-01-05
AttachmentsAttachment
